import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search model issues"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/for/models/link"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches model issue association records based on model, category, or integration filters. Use this to find ModelIssueId values for later updates or to audit which issues are linked to which models.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ModelIds (optional)** - Obtain from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id).
2. **ModelCategoryIds (optional)** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/categories/of/models](/docs/api/categories/list-model-categories) and extract `Items[].CategoryId`.
3. **AppIds (optional)** - Use your integration registration IDs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Gather the filter IDs you want to scope by.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models/link](/docs/api/model-issues/search-model-issues) with `GetModelIssuesRequest` filters.
3. Use returned `Items[].ModelIssueId` values for link, unlink, or app overrides.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None. Provide at least one filter (ModelIds, ModelCategoryIds, or AppIds) to limit results.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"SiteScope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site","Personal","GlobalOnly","Aggregate"],"default":"Aggregate"},"AppIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"nullable":true},"ModelIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"ModelCategoryIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"IssueCategoryIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true}},"example":{"ModelIds":["d4e5f6a7-b8c9-0123-d4e5-f6a7b8c90123"]},"title":"GetModelIssuesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
